```{r setup}
#| message: false
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
```

# Analyses

This is code examples to detail.

```{r testmap}
#| message: false
read_tsv("data/dummy_data.tsv") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Xfield, Yfield, size = CircCorr)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  coord_fixed()
```

```{r testabund}
#| message: false
read_tsv("data/dummy_data.tsv") %>% 
  group_by(Plot, Family, Genus, Species) %>% 
  summarise(abundance = n()) %>% 
  write_tsv("outputs/species_abundance.tsv")
```

```{r testrankabund}
#| message: false
read_tsv("outputs/species_abundance.tsv") %>% 
  arrange(desc(abundance)) %>% 
  mutate(rank = 1:n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(rank, abundance)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_y_log10()
```
